message.entry: Could not determine quantized parameter value for property ''{0}'' because there is no connection to the radio.
Plugin structure required. Construct an SDR device object using ''sdrdev''.
Support for the Analog Devices FMCOMMS1 RevB/C RF card with Zynq hardware has been removed.
HDL code generation using the Software Defined Radio target workflow in HDL Coder will be removed in a future release. See documentation for further guidance and recommended alternatives.
Support for {0} has been removed. Use 'AD936x' instead.
The ''{0}'' radio object has been removed. Create an {1} object instead by calling sdrdev(''{1}''). Learn more.
The {0} System object has been removed. Create a comm.SDR{1}{2} System object instead by calling {3}(''{2}''). Learn more.
The ''{0}'' radio object has been removed. Create an {1} object instead by calling sdrdev(''{1}''). Learn more.
The {0} System object has been removed. Create a comm.SDR{1}{2} System object instead by calling {3}(''{2}''). Learn more.
The ''{0}'' block has been removed. Use the {2} {1} block from the {3} instead.
Target platform ''{0}'' has been removed. Use ''{1}'' instead.
